data.author: Kiezel

changelog.release_notes: Fixed issue in case quick view is already visible on startup of Essential.

Added support for Pebble 2
Added step counting for Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel and Pebble 2
Added Heart rate monitoring for Pebble 2
-Brought back the slick animations to the OG Pebble
-Removed animations and snow for Aplite (was causing too many problems)

-New Winter/Christmas color presets
-New Realistic Snow Fall (Static, shake for snow, or snow globe effect)
-New Battery Icon
-New Animations
-New Pebble Time Round Shake Features

New features
-Pebble Time Round Color Presets

Bugs
- Pebble Time Round Crash Fix
- Animation Fixes
- Other Bug Fixes
Fixed issue with color inversion on BT disconnect for pebble OG

- Pebble Time Round Support
- Date icon adjustment
- Weather fix for 3.6 release
Now use Yahoo weather as standard weather provider instead of OpenWeatherMap
Fixed location weather support. Now you can turn of your smartphone GPS to save on battery!
Fixed issue that prevented some users from changing the settings when in trial mode

data.description:
Kiezel Watchfaces | Essential

This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Essential brings the style of the Pebble smartwatch to your watchface. It is fully customizable. You can customize the colors of the icon fills, icon stroke, time text, text box, text box stroke, and the color. You can also toggle icons to display date, weather, battery or steps. Choose what temperature unit you want to see. Also it supports both 12hr time and 24hr time. Choose how often to update the weather to save on battery. Also included is vibrate on bluetooth disconnect and show b/w version on bluetooth disconnect.

NOTE: Those that don't have a license will be using a 24hr trial. After 24hrs, the face will go back to default black/white state.

Enjoy!

Kiezel-
data.title: Essential
